introduction: Cynthia is unhappy with her 9-5 lower class life style and wishes she could go back in time to her college days and date Boyd Matheson. Who would later grow up to be a highly successful film producer, making Cynthia's life more richer. She get's her wish by a supernatural red light entity, only it sends her back through various time periods. From escaping the Manson family, helping a runaway slave make it to Harriet Tubman, and being accused of witch craft in Salem. Only time will tell, how far back Cynthia will travel through...Yester Years.
